# wrappy

Callback wrapping utility

## USAGE

```javascript var wrappy = require(“wrappy”)

// var wrapper = wrappy(wrapperFunction)

// make sure a cb is called only once // See also: http://npm.im/once for this specific use case var once = wrappy(function (cb) {

var called = false return function () {

if (called) return called = true return cb.apply(this, arguments)

}

})

function printBoo () {
console.log(‘boo’)

} // has some rando property printBoo.iAmBooPrinter = true

var onlyPrintOnce = once(printBoo)

onlyPrintOnce() // prints ‘boo’ onlyPrintOnce() // does nothing

// random property is retained! assert.equal(onlyPrintOnce.iAmBooPrinter, true) ```
